resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions.
Your emergency contacts will be notified by SMS in case of an emergency or incident report

© Enqath 2016 


An application that was made with the intention of making the UAE a better place. 
 The application aims to ease the incident reporting methods and makes it as accurate as possible.


Found a bug?
 Please help us fix it by sending us feedback (use the mail button on top).


By using this application, you agree to our terms and services.
This app uses the following open-source libraries:


DroidParts 
 (https://github.com/yanchenko/droidparts/tree/develop)
